TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cursor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents the image used for the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The class contains a set of default cursors. When running in Partial Trust, only the default cursors defined in the class are allowed. ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *cursorName* The name of one of the predefined cursors in the class. ## Examples [How to: Change the Cursor Type](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream cursorStream) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For a <xref:System.IO.Stream>, WPF writes the data to a temporary file and then loads the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> from the file. If this constructor is unable to create a temporary file, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> might be thrown. For example, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> might be thrown if a unique temporary file is not available. To resolve this error, try deleting unneeded temporary files.

Docs.exception: This constructor was unable to create a temporary file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string cursorFile) cil managed

Docs.param: The file that contains the cursor.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified *.ani* or a *.cur* file.
Docs.exception: is not an *.ani* or *.cur* file name.
